subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In four sleepless days, Omar Minaya took the weakest aspect of the Mets — their bullpen — and made it their strength by acquiring Francisco Rodríguez and J.J. Putz.
snippet: In four sleepless days, Omar Minaya took the weakest aspect of the Mets — their bullpen — and made it their strength by acquiring Francisco Rodríguez and J.J. Putz.
